settings for..

## debian linux

reboot after modifying..

`sed -i 's/XKBVARIANT=""/XKBVARIANT="colemak"/' /etc/default/keyboard`

## windows 8

install [Colemak](http://colemak.com/wiki/index.php?title=Windows). Then..

- open Control Panel → Clock, Language, and Region → Language → Advanced
  Settings

    - under "Override for Windows display language"
        - choose "Use language list (recommended)"
        - click "Apply language settings to the welcome screen..."
        - under "Administrative" tab
            - click "Copy settings"

    - under "Override for default input method"
        - select "Colemak..."
